items.question: How does the NLP engine determine link relevance?
items.answer: We use a proprietary transformer model trained on over 500k high-ranking SEO pages. It analyzes semantic vectors, topic density, and sentiment to ensure links aren't just keyword matches, but contextually accurate additions.

items.question: Does the auto-injection work with headless CMS?
items.answer: Yes. For headless environments (Contentful, Sanity, Strapi), Dofollo provides a REST API and webhooks. You can review suggestions in our dashboard, and we push the changes to your content model JSON/HTML fields automatically.

items.question: What happens if I cancel? Do I lose my links?
items.answer: Absolutely not. The links Dofollo builds are inserted directly into your content's HTML. If you cancel your subscription, the links remain 100% yours forever. We don't use JavaScript redirects or overlays.

items.question: Can I blacklist specific pages or keywords?
items.answer: Yes. You have granular control to exclude specific URLs (like T&Cs, Login pages) or specific anchor text patterns. You can also set 'negative keywords' to ensure brand safety.

items.question: Does Dofollo slow down my website?
items.answer: No. Dofollo operates as an external analysis tool. The only interaction with your live site is when you approve a link injection, which is a static HTML update. We do not inject any client-side scripts that affect page load speed.
